dct_title_s: Carta reducida que comprénde las costas septentrionales de la California
dct_description_sm: The map displays the Spanish knowledge of the coast at the time of Captain Cook's voyage along the coast. When it was printed it was out of date but illustrated findings from Spanish explorations.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows North American coastline from Gulf of Alaska to Monetery, including islands, topography, drainage, routes.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
